abstract: Complaints about its six-speed dual-clutch transmission prompted Ford to issue a bulletin to its dealers but did not prevent it from falling 10 places in the magazine's reliability survey.
snippet: Complaints about its six-speed dual-clutch transmission prompted Ford to issue a bulletin to its dealers but did not prevent it from falling 10 places in the magazine's reliability survey.

headline.main: Transmission Woes Addressed by Ford, but Too Late for Consumer Reports
